hero.name: The Genie
hero.specialAbility: At the start of your turn, you may discard 1 card to gain 1 action.

cards.title: Your Wish is My Command
cards.basicText: After combat: If you won the combat, you may discard 2 cards to gain 1 action.

cards.title: Wishing For More Wishes
cards.basicText: After combat: Your opponent draws 1 card. Draw 3 cards.

cards.title: Three Wishes
cards.basicText:
Gain 1 action and choose one effect: 
• draw 5 cards 
• for the rest of your turn, your cards' values are 4 and cannot be changed 
• each opponent discards 2 cards

cards.title: This is No Parlor Trick
cards.duringText: The value of your opponent's card is equal to its BOOST value.

cards.title: Prisoner's Torment
cards.basicText: After combat: Draw cards equal to the amount of combat damage you took.

cards.title: I've Made Sultans Out of Less
cards.basicText: After combat: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card for them to discard.

cards.title: Imprisoned Wrath
cards.basicText: After combat: You may discard 2 cards to deal 2 damage to an adjacent opposing fighter.

cards.title: I Grant You Death
cards.basicText: After combat: You may deal 1 damage to an adjacent fighter.

cards.title: I Am Freed
cards.basicText: After combat: Place the Genie in any empty space. Then, deal 1 damage to each adjacent fighter.

cards.title: Careful What You Wish For
cards.basicText: After combat: If you lost the combat, deal 1 damage to an adjacent opposing fighter.

cards.title: Feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
